kathanayakathumani, athigaru janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage duradakna niwaradi nayakathwaya yatathe 2010 wasara sandaha wu ayawaya mema garu sabhawata idiripath kirimata labima ma lada wishala gaurawayak.2. 2010 janawari masaye di athigaru janadhipathithumatath, 2010 aprel masayedi maha mathiwaranaya thulin eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayatath athi mahath janawaramak labadima pilibanda me rate mahajanathawa wetha kruthagnyathawaya pala kirima mage parama yuthukamak wenawa.athimahath bahutharayakin mema mathiwarana dekedima jayagrahanaya kirimata hakiwima 2005 di apa rate nayakathwaya bhara ganimin athigaru janadhipathithuma gena giya wadapiliwela janathawa pahadiliwama anumatha kara thibimak.el.ti.ti.ee. thrasthawadaya sarthakawa sahamulinma mardanaya kirimata saha samaya sthapitha kirimata athigaru janadhipathithuma ganu labu abhitha piyawara nisa, thunen dekakata aasanna chandadayakayin pirisak ethuma kerehi wishwasaya thabuwa.shri lankawa aasiyawe aashcharya bawata path kirimata “mahinda chinthana-idiri dakma” janadhipathiwarana prakashaya magin labadun poronduwa rate janathawa hadawathinma walanda gath bawada mema mathiwarana dekenma labadun janawarama magin thahawuru wenawa.3.
